Do you still see this? If so, please provide more information. The attacked .log shows a bug when preparing a preview but I cannot reproduce this. 

>eclipse hangs, and there is no way
>of making it return control.
Hangs forever, for a second?

If you can still reproduce this using 3.2.2 or 3.3 M7 please create stack dumps and attach them here. See also:
http://www.eclipse.org/eclipse/platform-text/development/bug-incomplete.htm
No, I cannot reproduce this using later builds.
